title: How to negotiate a raise - Quora

response.answer_text: You ask for one and specify your wish (put your "wow" salary, but still a realistic one for you). If you feel you are offered too less, you can always check in the market what other offers are you getting. Before going to the market, prepare your CV, linkedIn but importantly, your own perspective over your role in a team/organization, how do you see your strength becoming pillars in a team, and sell that real thing, it is no lie.

The key to negotiating a raise is explaining your worth.  If you bring value to the company it is easy to justify a raise.   So the best way would be to outline your personal worth to the company to make sure you are fairly compensated for your efforts.
